page.title: 11CLUBS IN ROADE
page.content: CLUBS FOR CHILDREN..... SCOUTS AND CUB SCOUTS , BROWNIES, BOYS BRIGADE , RED CROSS , GIRLS BRIGADE , JUNIOR SWIMMING CLUB , YOUTH CLUB , GIRL GUIDES,BMX (CYCLING)CLUB, PLAYGROUP,MOTHER AND TODDLER CLUB, SUNDAY SCHOOL. ------------------------------------ CLUBS FOR ADULTS....... EVERGREEN CLUB (FOR OLD PEOPLE) , FOOTBALL CLUB,CRICKET CLUB, WOMENÂ£S INSTITUTE,BOWLING CLUB,MOTHERS UNION, BRITISH LEGION CLUB, SUB AQUA CLUB, TENNIS CLUB,YOGA CLUB, DRAMA GROUP. ------------------------------------- AT THE COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL THERE ARE LOTS OF EVENING CLASSES FOR ADULTS. SUBJECTS INCLUDE CRAFTS,SPORTS AND FOREIGN LANGUAGES. (BY SCOTT MILLER AGE 10)
